mapper.insert: INSERT INTO download_history (id, created_at, updated_at, enabled, task_id, client_ip, web_server_host, app_server_uuid, app_server_thread_id, app_server_thread_name, req_route, req_params) VALUES (default, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt}, #{enabled}, #{taskId}, #{clientIp}, #{webServerHost}, #{appServerUuid}, #{appServerThreadId}, #{appServerThreadName}, #{requestRoute}, #{requestParameters})
